# API Reference for cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig

   TerraformOutputConfig <a name="TerraformOutputConfig" id="cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig"></a>
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  &cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig {
  	Value: interface{},
  	DependsOn: *[]github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf.ITerraformDependable,
  	Description: *string,
  	Sensitive: *bool,
  	StaticId: *bool,
  }
  ```

  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.value">Value</a></code> | <code>interface{}</code> | *No description.* |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.dependsOn">DependsOn</a></code> | <code>*[]<a href="#cdktf.ITerraformDependable">ITerraformDependable</a></code> | *No description.* |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.description">Description</a></code> | <code>*string</code> | *No description.* |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.sensitive">Sensitive</a></code> | <code>*bool</code> | *No description.* |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.staticId">StaticId</a></code> | <code>*bool</code> | If set to true the synthesized Terraform Output will be named after the `id` passed to the constructor instead of the default (TerraformOutput.friendlyUniqueId). |

  ## `StaticId`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="StaticId" id="cdktf.TerraformOutputConfig.property.staticId"></a>
  
  ```go
  StaticId *bool
  ```
  
  - *Type:* *bool
  - *Default:* false
  
  If set to true the synthesized Terraform Output will be named after the `id` passed to the constructor instead of the default (TerraformOutput.friendlyUniqueId).
  
  ---
